docs.snippet: Fabio Capello, the Italian coach of England's national team, resigned Wednesday....
docs.abstract: Fabio Capello, the Italian coach of England's national team, resigned Wednesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: England's preparations for this summer's European Championship were thrown into tumult Wednesday when Fabio Capello, the Italian coach of the national team, resigned.

headline.print_headline: Groupon Posts a Loss in Its First Earnings Report Since Going Public

headline.main: Hyundai Spins Off Two Elantra Variants at Chicago Auto Show

docs.snippet: The Korean automaker continues to fill out its model line with cars that slot below its Sonata sedan....
docs.abstract: The Korean automaker continues to fill out its model line with cars that slot below its Sonata sedan.
docs.lead_paragraph: Hyundai introduced two new body styles for its brisk-selling Elantra in Chicago on Wednesday: the 2013 Elantra GT four-door hatchback and Elantra Coupe. The offerings will join the Elantra sedan in the cutthroat compact segment, a class that includes the Ford Focus, Honda Civic, Chevrolet Cruze, Volkswagen Golf, Mazda 3 and Subaru Impreza, among others.

headline.main: Romney Plays Down Import of Tuesday's Losses

docs.snippet: Mitt Romney congratulates Rick Santorum and then tries to minimize the battles he lost....
docs.abstract: Mitt Romney congratulates Rick Santorum and then tries to minimize the battles he lost.

headline.main: Romney Plays Down Import of Tuesday's Losses

docs.snippet: Mitt Romney congratulates Rick Santorum and then tries to minimize the battles he lost....
docs.abstract: Mitt Romney congratulates Rick Santorum and then tries to minimize the battles he lost.
docs.lead_paragraph: ATLANTA - After a string of losses Tuesday night, Mitt Romney landed in Georgia and promptly took questions from his traveling press corps, congratulating Rick Santorum for his strong showing in Colorado, Minnesota and Missouri the night before, while simultaneously trying to to minimize the results.

docs.snippet: Andrew Bogut is injured, Stephen Jackson appears unhappy and on Tuesday night Brandon Jennings seemed unmotivated....
docs.abstract: Andrew Bogut is injured, Stephen Jackson appears unhappy and on Tuesday night Brandon Jennings seemed unmotivated.

docs.snippet: Andrew Bogut is injured, Stephen Jackson appears unhappy and on Tuesday night Brandon Jennings seemed unmotivated. The Bucks have played well at times this season; the question is, will they do so again?...
docs.abstract: Andrew Bogut is injured, Stephen Jackson appears unhappy and on Tuesday night Brandon Jennings seemed unmotivated. The Bucks have played well at times this season; the question is, will they do so again?
docs.lead_paragraph: When Andrew Bogut fractured his left ankle in late January against the Houston Rockets, his Milwaukee Bucks teammates rallied for a demonstrative win. After he was ruled out of the lineup indefinitely, the Bucks made a valiant stand in a 6-point loss to the mighty Chicago Bulls. The Bogut-less Bucks then followed that effort with a sound win over the Los Angeles Lakers (despite Milwaukee's substantial size disadvantage), a blowout victory against the Detroit Pistons and an incredible comeback win over the Miami Heat.

headline.main: Taylor Mac Will Be Puck in 'A Midsummer Night's Dream'

docs.snippet: The actor Anthony Heald and the downtown performance artist Taylor Mac have been cast in the Classic Stage Company's coming production of "A Midsummer Night's Dream," the theater announced on Wednesday....
